Open infrastructure for an open economy

Zeppelin creates systems, tools and protocols to promote global economic freedom. We also provide security services to aid the community in growing on solid foundations.

The challenges of building decentralized networks

Security

High security risks due to software code powering real money.

Developer experience

Lack of proper development and testing tooling increases margin of errors exponentially.

Operations

It’s costly and difficult to fix problems in smart contract systems after they are live.

Your blueprint for decentralized systems

We are focused on setting standards and building open-source technology to close the gap between our vision and the reality of how decentralized networks work today.

Smart Contract Libraries

A framework of modular, reusable, secure smart contracts for the Ethereum network, written in Solidity.

Ideal for learning

Reduced risks of vulnerabilities

Standard, tested, community-reviewed code

Development Platform

A development platform for secure smart contract applications.

Bug fixing and upgradability management

Seamless developer experience

Visit site Go to docs

Accsess Control Platform

A protocol that allows blockchain projects to control the ways in which their native digital assets are transferred.

Guarantee compliance in every trade

Transfer restrictions based on trade requirements
